ygData.subject: Re: Out of the Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: The wave of plasma almost reaches Sinnertwin, but it is lost in the fire of his deadly breath. Something else hit him from behind however, and sent him flying

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The wave of plasma almost reaches Sinnertwin, but it is lost in the fire
of his deadly breath. Something else hit him from behind however, and
sent him flying forwards, his breath and cannon shooting wildly around
him.
